TextLibrary.Text: Please, I beg you - don't take me to Utrarg! My life will be miserable!
Please, I beg you - don't take me to Utrarg! My life will be miserable!
Please, I beg you - don't take me to Utrarg! My life will be miserable! We could be sisters, you and I. Would you force your sister into a loveless marriage?
Please, I beg you - don't take me to Utrarg! My life will be miserable! We could be sisters, you and I. Would you force your sister into a loveless marriage?
Your father says your marriage will bring a new era of peace - an alliance between these two kingdoms. It is your duty!
Your father says your marriage will bring a new era of peace - an alliance between these two kingdoms. It is your duty!
Your father says your marriage will bring a new era of peace - an alliance between these two kingdoms. It is your duty!
Your father says your marriage will bring a new era of peace - an alliance between these two kingdoms. It is your duty!
Duty! Ha! I'm nothing but a pawn in my father's political games. I beg you...take me to Bartonia!
